alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Clair (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 6:27PM CDT until June 16 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN JEFFERSON AND CENTRAL ST. CLAIR COUNTIES... At 627 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Argo, or near Springville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Trussville, Pell City, Moody, Springville, Odenville, Center Point, Clay, Pinson, Margaret, Argo, Riverside, Ragland, Chalkville, Bald Rock, Harrisburg, Branchville, Logan Martin Lake, Grayson Valley, St. Clair County Airport and St. Clair Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
